cv2 IO¶

cv2.imread(filename[, flags])¶

Official OpenCV Documentation

Parameters:
  • filename (str) – The location of the file to open
  • flags (integer or none) – The flags to use while opening
Returns:

numpy.ndarray with the image data in BGR format
cv2.imwrite(filename, img[, params])¶

Official OpenCV Documentation

Parameters:
  • filename (str) – The location to save the file to
  • img (ndarray) – The image data to write out
  • params – Format specific save parameters
